long_description: The WrightSock CoolMesh II Tab-Back socks supply low-profile fit with a double-layer design that minimizes friction and blisters and wicks moisture away. Perfect for excellent multisport performance. Inner layer is made of smooth, undyed, hydrophobic Dri-WRIGHT II(TM) polyester, nylon and Lycra(R) spandex to maximize moisture wicking for cool, dry feet. Outer layer of Dri-WRIGHT II polyester, nylon and Lycra spandex and mesh weave enhances moisture control and airflow. Interaction between inner and outer layers absorbs friction and shearing forces to prevent blisters. Mesh panel across the top of the foot allows maximum wicking action; arch braces help support feet. *Discount will be applied when you check out. Offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: The WrightSock CoolMesh II Tab-Back socks supply low-profile fit with a double-layer design that minimizes friction and blisters and wicks moisture away. Perfect for excellent multisport performance.
